Hydaelyn is the world in which Final Fantasy XIV takes place.
Zodiark represents Light, while Hydaelyn represents dark.
The Warrior of Light is chosen by Hydaelyn, the Mothercrystal.
Emet-Selch was the heart of Zodiark.
Two of the Scions of the Seventh Dawn have been possessed by an Ascian.
The Ascians\' names are actually their titles.
